mapper.select: select H_CODE , H_ADDRESS , H_CTG , EMG_YN , H_NAME , H_TEL , H_CT_MON , H_CT_TUE , H_CT_WEN , H_CT_THU , H_CT_FRI , H_CT_SAT , H_CT_SUN , H_CT_HOL , H_ST_MON , H_ST_TUE , H_ST_WEN , H_ST_THU , H_ST_FRI , H_ST_SAT , H_ST_SUN , H_ST_HOL , HOS_LONGITUDE , HOS_LATITUDE from hospital where h_code = #{ hpid }
select NICKNAME , R_CONTENT , R_DATE , RATE , H_CODE , H_NAME from REVIEW join MEMBER using(mem_no) join hospital using(h_code) where h_code = #{ hosCode } order by r_date desc

SELECT mem_no, mem_name, CASE diagnosis_type WHEN '1' THEN '일반진료' ELSE '비대면진료' END AS diagnosis_type, add_symtom AS add_symtom, order_date || 'T' || order_time as "start", order_date || 'T' || to_char((to_date(order_time, 'HH24:MI')+ (INTERVAL '30' MINUTE)),'HH24:MI') AS "end", order_today, CASE order_status when 'W' then '예약대기중' when 'C' then '진료대기중' else '완료' end as order_status, CASE order_status when 'W' then '' when 'C' then 'green' else 'gray' end as backgroundcolor, mem_Id, h_code FROM h_order JOIN member USING (mem_no)
mapper.update: update h_order set order_status = 'C' where mem_no = #{memNo} and order_status != 'N'
mapper.select: select RATE , count(*) as review_count from review where h_code = #{ hosCode } and rate in (0,1,2,3,4,5) group by rate order by rate desc
mapper.update: update review set rv_status = 'N' where r_no = #{revNo}
mapper.select: SELECT mem_no, mem_name, CASE diagnosis_type WHEN '1' THEN '일반진료' ELSE '비대면진료' END AS diagnosis_type, add_symtom AS add_symtom, order_date || ' ' || order_time as "start", order_date || 'T' || to_char((to_date(order_time, 'HH24:MI')+ (INTERVAL '30' MINUTE)),'HH24:MI') AS "end", order_today, CASE order_status when 'W' then '예약대기중' when 'C' then '진료대기중' else '완료' end as order_status, CASE order_status when 'W' then '' when 'C' then 'green' else 'gray' end as backgroundcolor, h_name FROM h_order JOIN member USING (mem_no) join hospital using (h_code) where mem_no = #{ memNo }
select h_code ,nvl(avg(rate),0) as "review_avg" from review right outer join hospital using (h_code) group by h_code having h_code = #{ hosCode }
